      • splitMp3FixedLength

        public static java.lang.String[] splitMp3FixedLength(java.lang.String inputPath,
                                     int secondLengthPart,
                                     java.lang.String outputPath,
                                     java.lang.String nameOutputFile,
                                     int numberCharacter,
                                     int firstNumberInTheName)
                                              throws javax.sound.sampled.UnsupportedAudioFileException,
                                                     java.io.IOException,
                                                     EccezioneSuoni,
                                                     javazoom.jl.decoder.JavaLayerException
        Split an mp3 file in parts of fixed length
        Parameters:
        inputPath - absolute path of mp3 file to split
        secondLengthPart - lenght of the single part
        outputPath - absolute path of outout directory
        nameOutputFile - base name of single part
        numberCharacter - number of char in part's name
        firstNumberInTheName - first number in part's name
        Returns:
        The names of splitted mp3 file parts
        Throws:
        javax.sound.sampled.UnsupportedAudioFileException
        java.io.IOException
        EccezioneSuoni
        javazoom.jl.decoder.JavaLayerException

      • joinWav

        public static java.io.File joinWav(java.lang.String outputWav,
                   java.lang.String[] inputWav,
                   boolean deleteInputFile)
                            throws javax.sound.sampled.UnsupportedAudioFileException,
                                   java.io.IOException
        Join the wav file contain in array inputWav in outputWav file. If deleteInputFile is true then input files are deleted.
        Parameters:
        outputWav - Concatenation of input files
        inputWav - files to join
        deleteInputFile -
        Returns:
        The join file
        Throws:
        javax.sound.sampled.UnsupportedAudioFileException
        java.io.IOException

      • joinWav

        public static java.io.File joinWav(java.lang.String outputWav,
                   java.lang.String inputWav1,
                   java.lang.String inputWav2,
                   boolean deleteInputFile)
                            throws javax.sound.sampled.UnsupportedAudioFileException,
                                   java.io.IOException
        Join the two wav file in outputWav file. If deleteInputFile is true then input files are deleted.
        Parameters:
        outputWav - Concatenation of inputWav1 and inputWav2
        inputWav1 - First wav file
        inputWav2 - Second wav file
        Returns:
        The join file
        Throws:
        javax.sound.sampled.UnsupportedAudioFileException
        java.io.IOException

                                    org.farng.mp3.TagException

        title - If null do nothing
        artist - If null do nothing
        album - If null do nothing
        Throws:

      • splitMp3FixedLength

        public static java.lang.String[] splitMp3FixedLength(java.lang.String inputPath,
                                     int secondLengthPart,
                                     java.lang.String outputPath,
                                     java.lang.String nameOutputFile,
                                     int numberCharacter)
                                              throws javax.sound.sampled.UnsupportedAudioFileException,
                                                     java.io.IOException,
                                                     EccezioneSuoni,
                                                     javazoom.jl.decoder.JavaLayerException
        Split an mp3 file in parts of fixed length. The first number in part's name is 1.
        Parameters:
        inputPath - absolute path of mp3 file to split
        secondLengthPart - lenght of the single part
        outputPath - absolute path of outout directory
        nameOutputFile - base name of single part
        numberCharacter - number of char in part's name
        Returns:
        The names of splitted mp3 file parts
        Throws:
        javax.sound.sampled.UnsupportedAudioFileException
        java.io.IOException
        EccezioneSuoni
        javazoom.jl.decoder.JavaLayerException
